name: Toast
desc: sourdough, pumpkin grain, or gluten free with preserves

name: Mixed grain porridge
desc: with plums and a white chocolate and almond crumble

name: Bircher muesli
desc: soaked with coconut & almond, turmeric, cinnamon & ginger, coconut yoghurt topped with seasonal fresh & dehydrated fruits

name: Coconut and almond milk chia pudding
desc: with elderflower jelly, mango puree, vanilla bean cashew cream, nut granola

name: Chilli scrambled eggs
desc: with finely diced crispy bacon, fresh chilli, parmesan, coriander and a chilli oil finish

name: Waffles
desc: in burnt maple cream, roasted pear, honeyjoy crumble with cereal milk pannacotta

name: Purple kale
desc: tossed with pearl barley, roasted pumpkin and cauliflower on hazelnut hommus toast, with almonds, sunflower seeds and poached eggs

name: Warm Green breakfast bowl
desc: with silverbeet, bok choy, zucchini noodles, green beans served with a poached egg, fresh red chilli, millet & a sesame lemon dressing

name: Smoked trout
desc: with crispy capers, fried eggs, kumera potato, cornichons, sweet pea pesto and crème fraiche

name: Louisiana plate
desc: bacon steak with poached eggs and corn remoulade on toast, pumpkin seed and lime guacamole, chilli prawns and a jalapeno popper

name: French toastie
desc: ham, gruyere, ricotta and wholegrain mustard

name: Rainbow vege bowl
desc: Pickled red cabbage, avocado, kale, julienne carrots, edamame beans, hazelnut hummus & fresh chilli on cauliflower rice with a poached egg

name: Super green salad
desc: of baby kale, peas, quinoa, nuts and seeds, avocado, broccoli, asparagus, edamame and mung beans, freekeh and cottage cheese

name: Old Bay fried chicken burger
desc: on black brioche, corn and chilli mayonnaise, herbed salad – with tater tots

name: Roast cricket noodle salad
desc: Oven dried crickets, glass noodles, wombok, cucumber, crushed peanuts & tomatoes with Vietnamese mint and a lemongrass & lime dressing
